description: Try our easy to follow Coke Stravaganza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Non-alcoholic drink,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coke Stravaganza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour juice of 1/2 a lemon into a Copa glass.
Add lots of ice then slowly top up with Coke.
Rim the glass with a lemon peel.
